Chapter.Label: Non-isomorphoric Algebras
Chapter.Heading: Small Algebras
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small LeftBrace AllSmallLeftBrace is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic LeftBrace of orders 2 to 3.
<#Include Label = "AllSmallLeftBrace">
The output leftbrace are represented by its operation table for +, *, as given in Section .

Checking Models of Small LeftBrace
"IsASmallLeftBrace" is a function for checking a model against the complete list of non-isomorphic LeftBrace of orders 2 to 3. It returns true if the model is a Small LeftBrace, false otherwise.
<#Include Label = "IsASmallLeftBrace">
